name: Aurora Railway
description:
A short story-focused game made over parts of December  2018 and January 2019 for WPI's Chill Jam.

Controls:

  • Z/X/C: Advance Text and Interact
  • Arrow Keys: Move

If you want to play it online, check it out on the PICO-8 website: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=32821!
